message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CR, cs.AI 

This paper deals with text classification and machine learning techniques for spam filtering on forums. The primary focus is on the application of Synthetic Minority Over-sampling Technique (SMOTE) to tackle imbalanced training data. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category for this paper is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. Other likely sub-categories include cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.LG (Machine Learning), which are also relevant to the topic of text classification and machine learning. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of various supervised classification algorithms, which could fall under cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) and cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence).
